sections.title: Title
sections.content: Systematic Review of frameworks_and_models: Frameworks, Models, Evidence, and Methods

sections.title: Abstract
sections.content: This systematic review evaluates frameworks, models, methods, and evidence patterns in frameworks_and_models. The protocol used 2 reviewer(s), explicit eligibility criteria, staged screening/coding, and PRISMA flow tracking. Records identified: 42; screened: 0; included: 0.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: This paper addresses methodological and substantive variation in the selected corpus, with emphasis on evidence standards and model operationalization.

sections.title: Methods: Protocol and Registration
sections.content: Protocol version: 1. Protocol locked: no. Checklist framework: PRISMA 2020.

sections.title: Methods: Eligibility Criteria
sections.content:
Inclusion criteria:
- Directly addresses at least one research question.
- Contains explicit framework/model/method details.
- Provides analyzable evidence.

Exclusion criteria:
- Out of scope for the research questions.
- No substantive evidence or methodological detail.
- Duplicate or insufficiently documented source.

sections.title: Methods: Information Sources and Search Strategy
sections.content: Primary source was the Zotero-derived corpus 'frameworks_and_models'. Data were drawn from OCR-parsed and coded dataset artifacts under /home/pantera/projects/TEIA/tmp/systematic_review.

sections.title: Methods: Selection Process and Inter-Rater Reliability
sections.content: Reviewer count: 2. General IRR formula: IRR = Agreeing Ratings / Total Ratings. Two-rater IRR formula: IRR = (TA / (TR * R)) * 100. Agreeing ratings: 0. Total ratings: 0. General IRR: n/a.

sections.title: Methods: Data Collection Process
sections.content: Data extraction and coding were run from structured batch payloads and direct-quote units, with evidence-unit level metadata preserved.

sections.title: Methods: Risk of Bias / Limitations in Evidence
sections.content: Risk considerations include attribution uncertainty, variable source quality, and possible reporting bias in underlying publications.

sections.title: Results: PRISMA Flow
sections.content: Records identified: 42. Duplicates removed: 0. Records screened: 0. Records excluded: 0. Reports assessed for eligibility: 0. Studies included in review: 0.

sections.title: Results: Synthesis of Findings
sections.content: Coded items: 0. Evidence units: 0. Coding mode: open.

sections.title: Discussion
sections.content: Findings indicate concentration in selected model families and uneven methodological depth across sources; unresolved conflicts should be adjudicated before final claims.

sections.title: Other Information (Funding, COI, Data Availability)
sections.content: Funding and conflict of interest statements should be completed explicitly. Data and artifacts are available in the systematic_review run directory.
